resources.string: The object of this game is to guess the number in as few tries as possible. Each number is used once. The Easy level is where you guess a four digit number. Medium level is for a five digit number. Hard level is for a six digit number. Super Hard is where you guess a seven digit number. When a digit is among the digits in the number, it is scored as a "Cow." When the digit is in the exact location, it is scored as a "Bell."
